file_content.text: I knew someone would come to rescue us! Welcome! Welcome!
We'll hold a parade in your honor! A feast! We must find a proper way to thank you for this!
Oh! We can start with a tour of the facility! It is a marvel of engineering, even if I do say so myself.
Of all the power stations I've seen on Hoth, this is certainly the best.
It's very nice.
Oh! You're making me blush! This station is my life's work. I've put my heart into every conduit and transformer.
And you are...?
Oh, I beg your pardon! I'm the chief engineer in charge of this power station. Isn't it beautiful?
Nobody mentioned there were civilians in here.
What are you doing here?
You came to our rescue, and you didn't even know we were here! Truly, you are a kind and generous being.
Wait... are those... are you carrying explosives? Oh dear.
You... you didn't come to rescue us, did you? You came... to destroy my power station.
At least you have your freedom. Go. Start over somewhere else.
Take this chance to escape.
There are charges set throughout the facility. Please evacuate at once.
You'd better leave.
This facility must be destroyed for the good of the Republic.
This place is a threat.
Now you've got an excuse to leave Hoth!
Look on the bright side.
I'm afraid so.
But why? My geothermal station never hurt anyone! It's harmless!
This facility represents years of hard work by hundreds of my people. We can't abandon it.
When the war is over, it will be the heart of our colony. We'll never survive here without it. Please reconsider?
Our sensors just picked up a massive number of troops headed this way! It's the Empire! We're under attack!
The Empire? Please, can't you help us? You saved us from the pirates; I know we can get through this, too!
The Imperial Army will be here any second. You might want to take cover before they get here.
I'll stand and fight for you.
Oh! Thank you! I knew you would change your mind! You're a great and courageous person!
If you're going to fight for our power station, then we'll stand and fight alongside you!
To arms, everyone!
Sorry. [Set the last charge.]
No! My station! Oh, what will we do? Everyone run!
